home.title: QuantumPay Blockchain Network
home.subtitle: A next-generation Layer-1 blockchain built for security, scalability, and regulatory readiness.
home.tagline: Open-source. Deterministic. Built for the long term.

features.fast_desc: Block finality is achieved within seconds using PoS + BFT consensus, ensuring predictable and irreversible transactions.
features.secure_desc: Cryptography-first architecture with slashing, validator accountability, and a clear trust boundary between on-chain and off-chain systems.
features.global_desc: Designed to serve regions without existing national blockchain infrastructure, starting from Southeast Asia and expanding globally.

about.title: About QuantumPay
about.description: QuantumPay is a public Layer-1 blockchain focused on long-term sustainability, low energy consumption, and transparent governance.
about.mission_desc: To provide a secure and neutral blockchain foundation for governments, enterprises, and open networks.

consensus.title: PoS + BFT Finality
consensus.desc: Validators stake assets and participate in Byzantine Fault Tolerant consensus to reach fast and irreversible finality without energy waste.

architecture.title: Modular Architecture
architecture.desc: Clear separation between core consensus, networking, execution, and off-chain services via gRPC and IPC.

opensource.title: Open-source by Default
opensource.desc: All core protocol code and specifications are published openly. GitHub is the single source of truth.

developers.title: Developers
developers.subtitle: Build directly on the QuantumPay base layer.

governance.title: Governance
governance.description: QuantumPay governance prioritizes protocol stability, transparent change control, and long-term network integrity.

contact.title: Contact
contact.note: There is no official Telegram, WhatsApp, or private DM support at this stage.
